name: Energy at home: low energy heating and the Renewable Heat Incentive
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Evaluating which heat-generating technology is best used in a particular self-build project requires looking at some very specific parameters including the location of the project, its orientation and size. This session covers a variety of technology solutions for new-build and existing properties undergoing refurbishment or extension, and looks at how the renewable heat incentive can support heat-generating technologies.
